subject: p18110020
Findings: Lungs are grossly clear. There are no new lung opacities which are of concern. There is no evidence to suggest pleural effusion or pneumothorax. Severe scoliosis is noted. Cardiomediastinal silhouette is unchanged. The nasogastric tube tip is in the stomach and right PICC line is approximately at the mid SVC.
